languages.text: {n}Сенешаль вздыхает.{/n} "При Леди Теодоре я неоднократно исполнял роль управителя торгового протектората. При этом я находился на Даргонусе, а не в странствиях с Вольным Торговцем. Если это возможно... после того, как непосредственная потребность в моем присутствии будет исчерпана... я бы хотел вернуться к той позиции. Присматривать за торговым протекторатом на мире-столице, попутно главенствуя над родом Версериан — и своим авторитетом помогая им возвыситься".

{n}The Seneschal sighs.{/n} "Under Lady Theodora, I served as steward of the trade protectorate on more than one occasion. In that capacity, I was based on Dargonus, rather than travelling with the Rogue Trader on the flagship. If it would be possible... after the immediate need for my presence is over... I would like to return to that position. To oversee the trade protectorate on the capital world, while at the same time presiding over the Werserian family — and using my authority to help elevate it."
languages.original_text: {n}Сенешаль вздыхает.{/n} "При Леди Теодоре я неоднократно исполнял роль управителя торгового протектората. При этом я находился на Даргонусе, а не в странствиях с Вольным Торговцем. Если это возможно... после того, как непосредственная потребность в моем присутствии будет исчерпана... я бы хотел вернуться к той позиции. languages.text: {n}Der Truchsess seufzt.{/n} "Unter Lady Theodora habe ich mehr als einmal als Vogt des Handelsprotektorats gedient. In dieser Kapazität war ich auf Dargonus stationiert, statt mit der Freihändlerin auf dem Flaggschiff zu reisen. Wenn es möglich wäre ... nachdem die unmittelbare Notwendigkeit meiner Anwesenheit nicht mehr gegeben ist ... würde ich gerne wieder dieses Amt ausüben. Um das Handelsprotektorat auf der Hauptwelt zu überwachen und gleichzeitig als Oberhaupt der Familie Werserian zu fungieren — und mit meiner Autorität zu deren Aufstieg beizutragen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal sighs.{/n} "Under Lady Theodora, I served as steward of the trade protectorate on more than one occasion. In that capacity, I was based on Dargonus, rather than travelling with the Rogue Trader on the flagship. If it would be possible... after the immediate need for my presence is over... I would like to return to that position. To oversee the trade protectorate on the capital world, while at the same time presiding over the Werserian family — and using my authority to help elevate it."

Um das Handelsprotektorat auf der Hauptwelt zu überwachen und gleichzeitig als Oberhaupt der Familie Werserian zu fungieren — und mit meiner Autorität zu deren Aufstieg beizutragen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le sénéchal soupire.{/n} « Au service de dame Théodora, j'ai joué le rôle d'intendant du protectorat commercial à de nombreuses reprises. J'exerçais cette fonction sur Dargonus, au lieu de voyager avec la libre-marchande à bord de son vaisseau amiral. Si possible... une fois que ma présence ici ne sera plus indispensable... j'aimerais retourner là-bas. Dans le monde-capitale, je pourrai veiller sur le protectorat tout en dirigeant la famille Werserian et user de mon autorité pour l'aider à s'élever. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal sighs.{/n} "Under Lady Theodora, I served as steward of the trade protectorate on more than one occasion. In that capacity, I was based on Dargonus, rather than travelling with the Rogue Trader on the flagship. If it would be possible... after the immediate need for my presence is over... I would like to return to that position. To oversee the trade protectorate on the capital world, while at the same time presiding over the Werserian family — and using my authority to help elevate it."

traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德叹了口气。{/n}“当我侍奉西奥多拉夫人时，我曾不止一次担任王朝的管家。担任管家期间，我始终驻扎在达戈努斯，而不是乘坐行商浪人的旗舰四处周游。如果可能的话……当我的紧急任期结束之后……我想回到原本的位置，监督首都世界的贸易。同时，我希望能指导韦尔森家族的工作，用我的力量提高家族的地位。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal sighs.{/n} "Under Lady Theodora, I served as steward of the trade protectorate on more than one occasion. In that capacity, I was based on Dargonus, rather than travelling with the Rogue Trader on the flagship. If it would be possible... after the immediate need for my presence is over... I would like to return to that position. To oversee the trade protectorate on the capital world, while at the same time presiding over the Werserian family — and using my authority to help elevate it."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德叹了口气。{/n}“当我侍奉西奥多拉夫人时，我曾不止一次担任王朝的管家。担任管家期间，我始终驻扎在达戈努斯，而不是乘坐行商浪人的期间四处周游。如果可能的话……当我的紧急任期结束之后……我想回到原本的位置，监督首都世界的贸易。同时，我希望能指导韦尔森家族的工作，用我的力量提高家族的地位。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}家令長はため息をついた。{/n}「シオドーラ様の下で、私は何度か貿易保護領の執事を務めました。その立場では、自由開拓者と共に旗艦に同行するのではなく、ダルゴナスに拠点を置いていました。もし可能であれば…私の存在が直接的に必要な期間が終わった後…私はその役務に戻りたいと思います。首都惑星で貿易保護領を監督し、同時にウェルザリアン家を統治し、その権限を利用してそれを高めるのを助けたいと思います」
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal sighs.{/n} "Under Lady Theodora, I served as steward of the trade protectorate on more than one occasion. In that capacity, I was based on Dargonus, rather than travelling with the Rogue Trader on the flagship. If it would be possible... after the immediate need for my presence is over... I would like to return to that position. To oversee the trade protectorate on the capital world, while at the same time presiding over the Werserian family — and using my authority to help elevate it."

traits.locale_text: {n}家令長はため息をついた。{/n}「シオドーラ様の下で、私は何度か貿易保護領の執事を務めました。その立場では、自由開拓者と共に旗艦に同行するのではなく、ダルゴナスに拠点を置いていました。もし可能であれば…私の存在が直接的に必要な期間が終わった後…私はその役務に戻りたいと思います。首都惑星で貿易保護領を監督し、同時にウェルザリアン家を統治し、その権限を利用してそれを高めるのを助けたいと思います」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}El Senescal suspira.{/n} «Bajo el mando de lady Theodora, serví como administrador del protectorado comercial en más de una ocasión. Cuando ejercía esas funciones, residía en Dargonus, en lugar de viajar en la nave insignia con la Comerciante Independiente. De ser posible... cuando pase la necesidad inmediata de mi presencia... me gustaría recuperar ese puesto. Supervisar el protectorado comercial en el mundo capital al mismo tiempo que gestiono la familia Werserian... y usar mi autoridad para elevarla».
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal sighs.{/n} "Under Lady Theodora, I served as steward of the trade protectorate on more than one occasion. In that capacity, I was based on Dargonus, rather than travelling with the Rogue Trader on the flagship. If it would be possible... after the immediate need for my presence is over... I would like to return to that position. To oversee the trade protectorate on the capital world, while at the same time presiding over the Werserian family — and using my authority to help elevate it."

languages.text: {n}Seneşal iç çekiyor.{/n} "Leydi Theodora'nın emrinde çok kez ticaret protektorasının idarecisi olarak çalıştım. Bu sıfatla Dargonus'a atanmıştım, yani Hür Tacir'le sancak gemisinde yolculuk yapmazdım. Mümkünse... Hizmetime duyulan ihtiyaç sonlandığında... Vazifemi tekrar Dargonus'ta ifa etmek isterim. Başdünyada ticaret protektorasını yönetirken Werserian ailesinin başında olmayı ve hanemi yüceltmek için nüfuzumu kullanmayı dilerim."
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal sighs.{/n} "Under Lady Theodora, I served as steward of the trade protectorate on more than one occasion. In that capacity, I was based on Dargonus, rather than travelling with the Rogue Trader on the flagship. If it would be possible... after the immediate need for my presence is over... I would like to return to that position. To oversee the trade protectorate on the capital world, while at the same time presiding over the Werserian family — and using my authority to help elevate it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Seneşal iç çekiyor.{/n} "Leydi Theodora'nın emrinde çok kez ticaret protektorasının idarecisi olarak çalıştım. Bu sıfatla Dargonus'a atanmıştım, yani Hür Tacir'le sancak gemisinde yolculuk yapmazdım. Mümkünse... Hizmetime duyulan ihtiyaç sonlandığında... Vazifemi tekrar Dargonus'ta ifa etmek isterim. Başdünyadaki ticaret protektorasını yönetirken Werserian hanesinin başında olmayı ve hanemi yüceltmek için nüfuzumu kullanmayı dilerim."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
